description:
CONGRATULATIONS CLASS OF 2015!

I created this course to teach college graduates and students how to get HIRED and EARNING. Using the INSIDE JOB model, students will apply their college experience to better understand the workplace and how to land their ideal job. Simply put, I'll get you HIRED and EARNING!

Why? Because this world needs you! Companies need you. We need your talent, skill and creativity. We need your big dreams, fresh ideas and unbridled optimism. This world needs you much more than you need a job. #TheWorldNeedsYou #GoGetYourJob
title: Inside Job: From Higher Learning To You're Hired and Earning
